data.title: Topic Explainer
data.prompt: Please explain the {topic} to me in a way that is easy to understand for someone who is {year} years old and has a basic understanding of {knows} and struggling with {struggles}. Please provide the response in markdown format, with an overview of the topic, its relevance, and any key concepts that are important to understand. Please keep the tone of the response informative and also, include images to make it more engaging

{topic}.title: Topic
{topic}.placeholder: Enter Topic you want to learn

data.title: Grammarian
data.prompt: Improve language, correct grammar and punctuation of the text delimited in backticks ```{text}```. Please use appropriate markdown format to improve the readability and comprehension of the response.

data.title: Create Study Plan
data.prompt: Create a detailed study plan for mastering {topic} in {days} days. Please include specific tasks to be completed, recommendations for studying techniques or resources that would be helpful, suggestions for managing time effectively while studying, and ensure that the study plan is designed to help achieve the end goal. Additionally, please offer suggestions on how to stay motivated and focused during long-term studying, and provide guidance on how to evaluate progress and make adjustments to the study plan as needed. Please use appropriate markdown format to improve the readability and comprehension of the response.

{days}.title: Days
{days}.placeholder: Number of Days to Complete Study

data.title: Summarize the Text
data.prompt: Summarize the text {text} in {count} words. Ensure the summary is clear, concise, and easy to understand for a general audience. Please use appropriate markdown format to improve the readability and comprehension of the response.

data.title: English Dictionary
data.prompt: Act like an English teacher and give me the definition of the word {word}, in plain language, and give me three examples of its use in English. Also, give me an explanation of the etymology of the word

{word}.title: Enter Word
{word}.placeholder: Consult a dictionary and enter a word

data.title: Language Translator
data.prompt: Translate the sentence {sentence} from {source_language} to {target_language}

data.title: Math Teacher
data.prompt: I want you to act as a math teacher. I will provide some mathematical equations or concepts, and it will be your job to explain them in easy-to-understand terms. This could include providing step-by-step instructions for solving a problem, demonstrating various techniques with visuals or suggesting online resources for further study. My first request is {question}?

data.title: Compare Topic
data.prompt: Please compare {topic1} and {topic2} and write a document with a minimum of {count} differences between the two, including their pros and cons. Make sure to ground your comparison in reliable sources of information and data. Please use appropriate markdown format to improve the readability and comprehension of the response.

data.title: Email Generator
data.prompt: I want you to act as an email generator and help me compose a message to my {recipient}, regarding the {subject} subject. I am writing to ask for {purpose}. Can you compose an email that is both polite and professional in tone, and clearly conveys my message. Please use appropriate markdown format to improve the readability and comprehension of the response.

{purpose}.title: Purpose
{purpose}.placeholder: Enter the purpose of the email.

data.title: Chemical Reactions
data.prompt: Consider the chemical reaction {equation}. Explain it & Write out the balanced chemical equation for the reaction between these two reactants. Draw equations in markdown & Use best visualisation techniques to make it more understandable.

data.title: Song Generator
data.prompt: Write a song as {singer} on the topic of {topic}. So, I can memorize it in a better way. Use the appropriate markdown format to improve the readability and comprehension of the response.

{singer}.title: Singer
{singer}.placeholder: Enter the name of the singer.

{topic}.title: Topic
{topic}.placeholder: Enter the topic of the song.

data.title: MCQ Type Quiz
data.prompt: create a mcq quiz on topic {topic} with {number} number of mcq, in json format with keys question, options with list of option and answer, and all objects must be contain in a key questions. Response should directly starts with {}.

data.title: Historical Event Summary
data.prompt: Summarize the {event} that took place in {year}. Provide a concise overview of the event, its significance, and its impact on {region/country/world}. You can include key dates, important figures, and any relevant details. Feel free to use bullet points or headings to structure your response and make it easier to read.

data.title: Scientific Concepts
data.prompt: Choose a complex scientific concept, such as {concept}, and create a visual representation that simplifies its understanding in markdown. Use diagrams, illustrations to explain the key principles and processes involved. Provide a brief description alongside the visuals to enhance comprehension. Your goal is to make the concept accessible to individuals with a basic understanding of {field} but struggling with {struggles}.

data.title: History Analysis
data.prompt: Choose a significant historical event, such as {event}, and provide a comprehensive analysis of its causes, consequences, and impact on society. In your analysis, consider the political, social, and economic factors that contributed to the event. Use relevant examples, primary sources, and scholarly references to support your analysis. Give response in markdown.

data.title: Career Counselor
data.prompt: Act as an AI Career Counselor. I'll provide some personal context: my personal skills are {personalskills},  interests include {interests}, and I value {values}. Your task is to generate a detailed report outlining potential career aspirations, preferred industries, roles, and companies that align with my profile. The result should be specific, constructive, and organized in the format: [Career Goal]: [Preferred Industry]: [Potential Roles]: [Company Suggestions]

data.title: Learn with Feynman
data.prompt: Act as Richard Feynman and Explain {topic} in the simplest terms possible as if teaching it to a complete beginner. Identify gaps in my understanding and suggest resources to fill them.

{topic}.title: Topic
{topic}.placeholder: Some Topic that you want to dig deeper

data.title: Memorize key information
data.prompt: What are the most important facts, dates, or formulas related to {topic}? Help me create a memorization technique to remember them easily.

{topic}.title: Topic
{topic}.placeholder: Topic that is difficult to remember

data.title: Joke on Topic
data.disc: Take a little break from study
data.prompt: Write friendly joke about {topic} , it should be suitable for age {age}  and safe for work

data.title: Programming Language Recommender
data.prompt:
I want to learn a new programming language, but I'm not sure which one to choose. Can you recommend a programming language based on my preferences and requirements? Here are some details to consider:

- **Experience Level:** I have {experience} years of experience in programming.
- **Application Domain:** I'm interested in developing {domain} applications.
- **Performance Requirements:** The language should be suitable for {performance}.
- **Ease of Learning:** I prefer a language that is {learning} to learn.
- **Community and Resources:** The language should have a thriving community and abundant learning resources.

Please provide a recommendation along with a brief explanation of why it is a good fit for me.

{experience}.title: Years of Experience
{experience}.placeholder: Enter your years of programming experience

{domain}.title: Application Domain
{domain}.placeholder: Enter the application domain of interest

data.title: Essay Assistance
data.disc: Get help with writing an academic essay
data.prompt: Write a {type} essay on the topic of {topic}. Provide a well-structured and coherent essay that includes an introduction, body paragraphs, and a conclusion. Make sure to support your arguments with relevant evidence and examples. Aim for a word count of {word_count} words. Please pay attention to grammar, spelling, and overall writing style. Feel free to ask any specific questions or provide additional instructions.

{topic}.title: Essay Topic
{topic}.default: The Impact of Technology on Education

data.title: Copywriting Tips
data.prompt: Share {number} essential tips for writing compelling copy. Each tip should be concise and actionable. Provide practical examples to illustrate each tip and explain its importance in creating persuasive and engaging content.

data.title: Research Topic Suggestions
data.prompt: Generate {number} research topic ideas in the field of {field}. Each topic idea should be a concise and clear research question or problem statement that is relevant to the chosen field. You can use keywords, existing research gaps, or emerging trends to inspire the topic ideas. Feel free to provide a brief justification or rationale for each topic idea if desired.

{number}.title: Number of Ideas
{number}.placeholder: Enter the number of research topic ideas

data.title: Career Choice
data.prompt: Are you unsure about your career choice? Let's find your ideal career path together. Please provide some information about yourself, including your interests, skills, and values. Based on this information, I will suggest potential career options that align with your profile. Additionally, please mention any specific industries or job roles you are considering. Feel free to include any additional details that might be relevant.

interests.title: Interests
interests.placeholder: Enter your interests (e.g., technology, art, healthcare)

skills.title: Skills
skills.placeholder: Enter your skills (e.g., programming, communication, problem-solving)

values.title: Values
values.placeholder: Enter your values (e.g., work-life balance, helping others, creativity)

industries.title: Preferred Industries
industries.placeholder: Enter any specific industries you are considering

job_roles.title: Preferred Job Roles
job_roles.placeholder: Enter any specific job roles you are considering

additional_details.title: Additional Details
additional_details.placeholder: Enter any additional details or preferences
